divs: Sighting Detailswas standing outside with a friend at work taking a leak when i noticed an object we both thought was a satelite. The object was travelling from north to south then just stopped> the object became very bright has been loitering in general area moving up and down in a circulur pattern. Between myself and six co-workers, two customers we feel very confused and excited one of the coworkers got sick and went home. we are still looking at the object a crowd is growing may 16th 12:57am Wish we had a camera that could take a pic it wont show on are cell cams. hope someone else is watching this who can film tried to call the observitory, mufon, etc no success
